title: VR Pimax Vision 5K PLUS
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


VR Resolution Redefined
Dual Custom Low Persistence Liquid Crystal Panels each with a stunning total resolution of 5120x1440 that sets a new standards in quality and immerses you like no other device before. Say goodbye to the dreaded screen door effect or "SDE", ghosting and smear as those effects are virtually invisible.

Superwide FOV
200 Degree Diagonal FOV is the closest to human vision of any commercially available product. No more looking through binocular effect with this new VR headset as you will notice immediately that enemies who could run away from the corner of your vision in a VR game cannot run away from you anymore. The Pimax 5K+ delivers an unparalleled true-to-life virtual reality experience like no other.

Strong Compatibility
Thanks to Pimax Compatibility Technology the Pimax 5K+ Headset supports most of the thousands of games and more available on BOTH Steam and Oculus Home. Enjoy movies and internet video content like never before. In addition, the Pimax 5K+ is compatible with other brand Steam Controllers and both the Steam VR Lighthouse 1.0 and 2.0 tracking technology.

More Comfortable
Ergonomically Designed face pad and strap so that you can comfortably stay immersed in that virtual world for long periods of time and it reserves enough room for wearing most prescription glasses. For maximum comfort the new Pimax 5K+ includes BOTH physical hardware and software IPD adjustments allowing the widest variety of people to enjoy the stunning immersion you can achieve in virtual reality.

Recommended PC Specs
OS: Windows 8.1, 10; GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1070 equivalent or better; CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better; RAM: 8GB or more; Ports: USB 2.0/3.0, DisplayPort 1.4; Desktop PC is highly recommended. PIMAX 5K Plus can support "Seated" and "Standing" VR games, such as Project Cars II. For Room-scale games, such as Beat Saber, you can purchase extra Base Stations and Motion Controllers that can support SteamVR 1.0 & 2.0 tracking tech.
Pimax Vision 5K PLUS Features

    144Hz Refresh Rate
    200 Degree FOV
    Dual 2560x1440p RGB LCD Panels
    6 DOF Tracking

title: CALL OF DUTY BLACK OPS for Wii
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


CALL OF DUTY BLACK OPS game for the Wii

Used - EXCELLENT condition       -          Includes original instruction booklet

The biggest first-person action series of all time and the follow-up to Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 returns with Call of Duty: Black Ops. Call of Duty: Black Ops will take you behind enemy lines as a member of an elite special forces unit engaging in covert warfare, classified operations, and explosive conflicts across the globe. With access to exclusive weaponry and equipment, your actions will tip the balance during the most dangerous time period mankind has ever known.

Cinematic Single Player Campaign
An epic campaign and story that takes you to a variety of locations and conflicts all over the world where if you are caught, captured or killed, your country will disavow all knowledge of your existence.

Signature Multiplayer
Call of Duty's signature multiplayer gameplay returns with new perks and killstreaks, deeper levels of character and weapon customization, and all new modes including:

Wager Matches: One in the Chamber, Gun Game, Stick and Stones, Sharpshooter
Combat Training: Test your skills solo or Co-Op with friends against AI enemy players

Zombies!
Fan favorite Zombie mode is back providing endless hours of Zombie-slaying entertainment, solo or Co-Op

Inspired by the experiences of real Black Ops soldiers of the era, the missions of Call of Duty: Black Ops take the player to a wide variety of settings, ranging from snowbound mountain strongholds in historical Soviet held territories, to the jungles and urban settings of Vietnam War era SE Asia. Throughout all, care has been taken to maintain the traditional essence of Call of Duty style combat, while also introducing new types of player action that add to the gameplay experience. Additional features include co-op, versus and team-based multiplayer options, new vehicles like the SR-71 Blackbird and lethal new weapons such as explosive-tipped crossbows.

Key Game Features:

Seventh installment of the Call of Duty series, based on the live fire conflicts of the Cold War era.

Diverse variety of play setting ranging from urban air and ground combat in SE Asia, to snow combat in Soviet region and jungle combat.  Blending of traditional COD, and new first-person character scenarios designed to both retain the essence of the COD gaming experience and ensure constantly flowing and varied action.  New arsenal of weapons and vehicles tied to the Cold War era, including the SR-71 Blackbird and sited explosive-tipped crossbows. Wide array of play modes including single player, local multiplayer versus and online co-op and multiplayer.

From a pet free and smoke free home

CASH ONLY
PICK UP ONLY (Jamison PA)

Guitar Hero World Tour combines state-of-the-art wireless controllers in new online and offline gameplay modes and a Music Studio feature that lets you compose, record, edit and share your own rock and roll anthems. Guitar Hero World Tour has 86 on-disc tracks. In the Band modes, up to four players can jam together, online or off, as they progress through the game, and in single-player Career Mode, players can jam on any of the instruments in-game utilizing the controllers in branching venue progression enabling them to rock out in the order of their choice. The Wii version of Guitar Hero World Tour features the exclusive Mii Freestyle mode, an intuitive gameplay mechanic that connects players to music in a whole new way by incorporating their Mii and engaging players with the freedom to create their own groove.

Product Information:

The first name in music instrument gaming returns with a Rock Band-esque focus on full band simulation, the ability for players to create their own music, and more than 80 new tracks in Guitar Hero: World Tour. For the first time in the series, wannabe rock stars can simulate singing and drumming in addition to the familiar strumming of guitar-shaped controllers, and with the addition of a bass guitar, up to four players can form a band and jam together. As with all titles in the Guitar Hero series, gamers must "play" their instruments by rhythmically matching onscreen prompts in order to earn high scores and unlock new songs. The singing mechanic resembles Karaoke Revolution and SingStar in that it requires vocalists to match the pitch and notes of each song, whereas drummers must be timely when depressing the kick drum and striking the proper combination of drum and cymbal pads.

A revamped single-player Career mode lets gamers advance their musician through a series of gigs by playing a specific number of songs, with the option to change difficulty level or instrument at anytime. The Band Career mode works in a similar fashion, offering up to four players the opportunity to advance through a full career, with the Battle of the Bands mode letting two groups duke it out online. Boss Battles also return in a form more akin to previous Face-Off modes, and they no longer feature the attack power-ups used in Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock and Guitar Hero: Aerosmith. Gamers can use the new "Create-a-Rocker" feature to customize the posture, age, hair, makeup, and tattoos of their unique characters, and real-life rock legends such as Ozzy Osbourne, Jim Hendrix, and Ted Nugent are also playable. Wii gamers have the further option of using their own "Mii" characters in the Mii Freestlye mode.

The song list spans several decades and is made up of a diverse selection of master recordings by artists such as: 311, the Allman Brothers Band, the Beastie Boys, Billy Idol, Blondie, Coldplay, the Cult, The Doors, The Eagles, The Foo Fighters, Jane's Addiction, Jimi Hendrix, Korn, Linkin Park, Los Lobos, Metallica, Michael Jackson, Modest Mouse, Motorhead, Nirvana, No Doubt, NOFX, Oasis, Ozzy Osbourne, Pat Benetar, R.E.M, the Sex Pistols, Steely Dan, Sting, the Stone Roses, Sublime, Tool, Van Halen, and Willie Nelson. In addition, players can create their own songs in the Advanced Studio mode by playing tracks for each instrument in either real or slowed time. Songs can be either 1,200 notes long or three minutes in length time then upload their songs to an online service where other gamers can rate and download each original creation. 

From a pet free and smoke free home

CASH ONLY 
PICK UP ONLY (Jamison PA)

title: Like New Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 - Xbox 360
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 is an Action-Adventure game which serves as the final chapter in Konami's Lords of Shadow reboot of the classic Castlevania game series. The game revisits the actions of one-time member of the 'Brotherhood of Light,' Gabriel Belmont, in the previous game installment and details the consequences of those actions in the face of the rise of a familiar, ancient evil that only he has the ability to combat.

The Return of Gabriel Belmont and Dracula
At the end of Castlevania: Lords of Shadow, the origin of Dracula and his legendary connection with the Belmonts was revealed. Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 is the sequel to that 2010 reboot of the Castlevania series for play on Next-Gen game consoles. In it fans can expect thrilling new twists, action, adventure and challenges, as Dracula returns, this time to battle ultimate evil. Yet the dilemma is that he himself is greatly weakened and yearning for release from his immortal bonds. To succeed against the powerful threat he stands against, the vampire lord must reacquire his old powers - and only his castle holds the key. However, the famed Belmont clan also seeks his ultimate destruction in this shocking conclusion to the Lords of Shadow series.

title: Wii Game: The Strike
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


***GAME ONLY***

Game Description

The Strike combines authentic environments based on real lakes, engaging gameplay with accurate fish and lure behaviors. Players can enjoy 3 different game-play modes including Quick Fish, Career and Bass Pro Shops Invitational Tournament, or compete with friends in mini games like boat races and casting challenges.

The game takes players to some of North America's most famous fishing hot spots and features eleven types of game fish including Largemouth, Smallmouth, and Striped Bass as well as Northern Pike and Muskie. In addition, realistic lake bottom topography, real-time time‚Äìof-day light effects, advanced graphics, and authentic fishing gear from the Bass Pro Shops stores, all combine to offer virtual anglers the most comprehensive fishing game experience to-date.

title: Nintendo NES Vintage Video Game Console w/ Zapper, etc.
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


Nintendo NES video game system with console, brand new pin connector installed, two controllers, AC adapter, A/V video cable, RF adapter, and zapper. I have a video clip proving working status, which I can share via email. TV and game not included, solely contextual to show function :) Fairly priced at 70 cash firm.

Notes: This is an original NES unit, and as with all of the older OEM NES-001 consoles, you may need to hit the Reset button once in a while or reload cartridges to get games to load. Dirty games will gum up the pin connector and cause connectivity issues, so it's important for longevity that only clean ones be loaded. Case has some yellowing and cosmetic imperfections.

The condition of this item(s) is extensively detailed in the high-resolution photos. Comes from a no-pet, non-smoking, temperature controlled environment. All sales final.

title: Magnavox Odyssey Video Game Console in Organizer Case with Extras
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


If you are looking you probably already know that the Odyssey is credited with being the first video game console!

Model 1TL200BK12.   

This is the second model made between mid-1974 and fall 1975 and in the earlier range given it has no Magnavox on the front.

The unit is untested but there was a note from a previous owner that stated that the unit and joysticks work as well as the accessories.  That said, I will sell this unit as non-working and as-is though sealed in it's case there seems little doubt the note is correct.

Unit looks great and little used with clean battery compartment.  There are spots of darkening of the white from age mostly at the corners and on parts of the joysticks.

The money and cards are in incredible shape (as are the other game used boards and parts) generally and even still have the backing paper on the stacks.  The rubber bands are likely original and have aged so they should be replaced for long term storage though they hold just fine and I have removed and replaced them to count the cards with no issue.

I did not count the money as there is no count in the manual but it certainly looks like that, too, is complete.  Top bill shows as worst from storage.

The poker chips are still wrapped though there is a small slit in the package.

The football yard markers are still attached to the score board card and the two footballs are loose.

Truthfully the whole package looks little played with.


Missing:
-Cartridge #2 of 6.  Cartridge #2 is only for the Ski & Simon Says game.  There is an extra cartridge, #7 in it's place.

-Roll of frosted tape that is easily replaced if desired.  This roll appears to be for overlays where static electricity does not hold them or an unusual screen.

-2 overlays (small & large) for Table Tennis is missing.  This overlay was a simple line in the middle overlay and the most basic of the included overlays.

Basic overlays and games (complete with 2 overlays unless noted):
Table Tennis (missing overlays)
Tennis
Football (wear at center line and 2 corners)
Hockey
Ski (cartridge #2 required and missing)
Submarine
Cat and Mouse
Haunted House
Analogic
Roulette
States (small tear and wear to accessory map)
Simon Says (cartridge #2 required and missing)



Now for the extras:
Cartridge #7.

The compartment holds 2 dice but there are 3.  The games included in the basic set made no mention of dice.

Lots of extra overlays (sets of 2 unless noted):
-small Basketball
-Baseball
-Fun Zoo
-Invasion
-Wipeout

Of course you get the organizer case along with it's "instruction" sheet.  The back lid seam is maybe 3/4 open so the lid needs to be supported to prevent it breaking off but even if that would happen in the future the snap down locks on the front should keep the unit secure even when carrying.  There are two areas of ink marking on the lid.

You also get a 47 page 1974 Magnavox catalog that includes the Odyssey in it.  The cover is slightly rounded off the spin but overall really nice condition and in full color.

title: Street Fighter II CE Z-Back Arcade Machine Multicade cabinet
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


This is a Street Fighter II Champion Edition Z-Back arcade cabinet that has been completely re-furbished and upgraded to run a multi-game cartridge with 1300 classic arcade games. This is a very collectible game, an Iconic 1990's cabinet!  It's tons of fun to relive the old arcade days with family and friends. This game is a show-stopper, it's beautiful.  It has been restored with all new artwork and looks and plays like new.    I am an arcade collector and I pride myself on my restorations.  You may find a cheaper arcade game but you won't find a nicer one.    Look around at stuff selling for 2x what I'm asking.   You are welcome to come play some games and test it out.  Put this in your gameroom or office - it's a conversation piece.  It screams 1990's !  It's like a time machine that will take you back to the old days when kids had a place to hang out and have fun for a few quarters.  

It has brand new authentic arcade 90's joysticks, buttons and switches - not the junk some of these reproduction cabinets have.    It has a real CGA CRT arcade monitor with a beautiful picture (no widescreen LCD here) that has just been serviced.   It's nearly impossible to get a good picture of a CRT display because of the bi-linear refresh, so pictures don't show up well but the screen is sharp and bright!   If you are looking for a real arcade cabinet that plays just like you remember and are not happy with a tiny arcade1up or a home made raspberrypi bartop with an old laptop monitor this is for you.  The game has a real arcade jamma pcb, not a windows computer with MAME, Arcade1up, Mala or Hyperspin or a raspberry pi so it won't crash.  You don't have to worry about rebooting it or deleting stuff.  

 All your favorite games from the 80s and 90s are on this beast. You will spend hours remembering awesome games you forgot.   It plays: Ms Pacman, Frogger, Galaga, Mortal Kombat, Street Fighter, X-men, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Simpsons, Donkey Kong, Dig Dug, Mario Bros, Super Mario Bros, Marvel Super Heroes, Captain America, The Punisher, Golden Axe, Moon Patrol, Burgertime, Pacman, Galaxian, Midway, Nintendo, Taito, Capcom classics and tons and tons of other games

Don't waste both our time with low-ball offers.  I know what these are worth and my price is very fair.

title: Playstation 5 PS5 Console Disc Version
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


For sale is my Playstation 5 I received this week.
You'll be getting it factory sealed and packaging includes the power cord, controller, stand, controller charging cable and HDMI cable.

Personally, I bought the disc edition not only for its ability to be backwards compatible with inexpensive used games from the great back-collection of PS4, but also for it's ability to play 4K UHD Blu-rays! That means you'll be able to watch 4K Ultra-HD movies in full 2160p on the console. However, the PS5 Digital Edition does not include a disc slot, and therefore can't play Blu-rays at all. For buying old Playstation 4 games and having the built in UHD Bluray player, and not worrying so much about drive space, makes the disc version a much smarter buy. Not to mention, Sony may or may not continue selling disc editions because of it's excellent value.


Unopened, factory seal sticker on the top. Centrally located, could even drive to you! Price is firm, looking to meet for cash at a Starbucks/grocery store/bank/etc. Can provide receipt upon request.

Serious inquiries may contact me
Chris

title: HOUSE OF THE DEAD ARCADE GAME
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


House Of The Dead Arcade game for sale. Great money maker for a location or great addition to any game room.

Gameplay
The House of the Dead is gun game. The characters' pistols use magazines which hold 6 rounds; players reload by shooting away from the screen. When a player sustains damage or shoots an innocent, one point of health is removed. The continue screen appears when all health is lost. If the player runs out of continues, the game is over. First-aid packs are available throughout the game which restore one point of health; some can be obtained from rescued hostages, while others are hidden inside certain breakable objects. Special items can be found within other breakables, granting a bonus to the player who shoots them. The player can earn additional health power-ups at the end of each level based on the number of hostages rescued.

Throughout the course of the game, players are faced with numerous situations in which their action (or inaction) will have an effect on the direction of gameplay. This is exemplified in the opening stage of the game when a hostage is about to be thrown from the bridge to his death. If the player saves the hostage, they will enter the house directly through the front door; however, if the player fails to rescue the hostage, the character is redirected to an underground route through the sewers. If the player rescues all hostages, a secret room full of lives and bonuses is revealed toward the end of the game.

Players can score additional points by shooting enemies in the head and by rescuing hostages.

Los Angeles,Ca,90029

title: Stacker Self Redemption Arcade Game
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


Stacker is a video game merchandiser manufactured by LAI Games. The goal of the game is to align rows of moving blocks on top of each other. A player who can stack 11 rows will win a minor prize, which is usually low in value, sometimes lower in value than the amount of money the player paid to play the game. A player who gets to the top row wins a major prize. The major prize varies from machine but will often include present day game consoles, Itouches, Gift Cards, etc.

This machine can be a great money earner at the right account.

title: HOUSE OF THE DEAD ARCADE GAME
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


House Of The Dead Arcade game for sale. Great money maker for a location or great addition to any game room.

Gameplay
The House of the Dead is gun game. The characters' pistols use magazines which hold 6 rounds; players reload by shooting away from the screen. When a player sustains damage or shoots an innocent, one point of health is removed. The continue screen appears when all health is lost. If the player runs out of continues, the game is over. First-aid packs are available throughout the game which restore one point of health; some can be obtained from rescued hostages, while others are hidden inside certain breakable objects. Special items can be found within other breakables, granting a bonus to the player who shoots them. The player can earn additional health power-ups at the end of each level based on the number of hostages rescued.

Throughout the course of the game, players are faced with numerous situations in which their action (or inaction) will have an effect on the direction of gameplay. This is exemplified in the opening stage of the game when a hostage is about to be thrown from the bridge to his death. If the player saves the hostage, they will enter the house directly through the front door; however, if the player fails to rescue the hostage, the character is redirected to an underground route through the sewers. If the player rescues all hostages, a secret room full of lives and bonuses is revealed toward the end of the game.

Players can score additional points by shooting enemies in the head and by rescuing hostages.

title: Turtle Beach Ear Force DSS Surround Sound Processor
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


- Dolby 7.1 channel surround sound processor
- Works with any stereo headset or headphones
- Headphone amplifier with variable bass boost
- Digital optical and analog stereo inputs
- Works with XBOX, PlayStation, PC and Mac
- The Ear Force DSS 7.1 channel Dolby surround sound processor transforms any stereo headset into full, immersive surround sound for playing Xbox, PlayStation or PC games and watching movies with Blu-ray or DVD players. It works with any set of stereo headphones and is the perfect complement to the Turtle Beach Ear Force series of stereo gaming headsets (X31, X11, XLC, Z1, Z2 and PX21). The optical digital input easily connects to a game console or media player for Dolby 7.1 channel surround sound and the analog input can also be used to upgrade analog stereo audio sources to Dolby Pro Logic IIx for virtual surround sound. A bass boost control adds sub-woofer effects for enhanced realism to any audio source. With the Ear Force DSS, video game and movie fans will be able to hear distinct audio events happening all around them, greatly enhancing the overall experience and rewarding gamers with a newfound competitive edge. DSS users playing games and watching movies on their game consoles will actually hear the 7.1 surround sound from certain 5.1 channel audio tracks via additional "hidden" channels called Dolby EX.

PowerA Quality Promise
At PowerA, our controllers are designed by passionate gamers. Our team has over two decades of experience in the gaming industry designing across all platforms. For the price, you‚Äôll be amazed at the features and quality built into this controller.

title: Analogue Super NT - Brand New / Sealed - Modern Super Nintendo console
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


I have a couple of Analogue Super NT's available - I have 1 of every color (Super Nintendo color / Super Famicom color / Black color).

If you don't know what these are, they are really cool little machines that play all of your Super Nintendo carts using FPGA circuits - they can also be easily modded to play ROMs as well as Carts. Like a modern version of your Super Nintendo - they have HDMI output @ 1080p to easily hook them up to modern TVs, and they use original SNES controllers. Just like playing on original hardware, there is no extra LAG like with emulators or Raspberry Pi's. 

Includes a couple of ROMs already loaded by the factory

These are sold out online, but I have these ones on-hand. Cash only, or make me a trade offer. We'll meet in a public location. Thanks for looking and feel free to reach out with any questions!


Specifications:

Analogue Super Nt [SF]
Super Turrican - Director's Cut (digital)
Super Turrican 2 (digital)
STDC Original SNES-style box art
HDMI cable
USB cable
Worldwide USB Power Supply [100-240v, 50/60hz, USA/JPN plug-type]
Controller not included

title: Gameboy Ds Macro black w/Home Charger
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


What is the Gameboy Macro? ....You might ask....well it is.... Simply a DS modded to run without a top screen. Paired with a nice looking body it becomes a pretty awesome Game Boy Advance! It can play any Game Boy Advance games (No GB or GBC cartridges, though) and comes with a built-in backlit screen and a replaceable rechargeable 8+hr battery. While the Game Boy Advance SP has these features, a Game Boy Macro has a horizontal form factor, which makes it more true to the original Game Boy Advance.

This Macro is simply a more powerful Gameboy Adavnce (GBA) system...Why?
Because it has a great rechargeable battery, Better brighter screen and thiner size body.

Comes with one gba game called:  Pirates of the Caribbean

Please note: Sound is lighter then a gba but you can put headphones on for loader sound or add a bigger speaker through the headphone jack.

If interest please text/E-mail for faster response, If this post is still active its still available....This is a great price as they sell for way more then I ask for.

Will be fully charged and ready to play

Marco has a light scratch on touch screen but you can remove touch screen, it was left in place for added protection.

Also was going to add a light bar but never did, So plastic clear grey bar was left in place, so you can also remove it if you like.

title: Nintendo Wii oKami
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


Okami HD
Once upon a time there was a small village called Kamiki Village, where everyone from the villagers to the animals, lived in peace and happiness. But then one day, the legendary monster Orochi, came back to life and put an evil curse on the entire area. Everything that had a bit of life, disappeared from the face of the earth, and in their place was left a dreadful, barren wasteland.

Take on the role of Amaterasu, the Japanese sun goddess who inhabits the form of a legendary white wolf Shiranui on a quest to defeat Orochi who is responsible for turning the world into a wasteland
Players must use Amaterasu's magical abilities and arsenal of items, attacks and Celestial Brush techniques to restore the land of Nippon to its previous glory full of life and color.
Along the way, Amaterasu will be called upon to help a cast of quirky and intriguing characters and defeat a bevy of brutal enemies to rid the land of Orochi's curse.
Players will be able to choose between playing in a modern widescreen format or the original 2007 release's 4:3 ratio.
Interactive loading game screens from the original game are also included, allowing players to earn bonus demon fangs which can be traded for in-game items.

title: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings (2011) PC DVD-ROM NEW!
desc:
QR Code Link to This Post


Available Now to Order: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings (2011) PC DVD-ROM NEW!

ONLY $29.99

To view and order

http://www.aimcollectibles.com/2019/02/witcher-2-assassins-kings-pc-game.html

Condition: NEW! Excellent condition. Shipped to Protect

INCLUDES:

The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings Game DVD
The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings Game Guide
DVD BONUS MATERIALS + AUDIO CD: Official Game Soundtrack

Product Information

Return to the world of The Witcher in The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings for the PC. Explore a Slavic fantasy world and battle against a range of supernatural foes as the last of this dying race of guardians. Immerse in a cinematic story with a full script of recorded dialogue, with each interaction affecting the overall outcome. Develop skills and unlock upgrades in this critically acclaimed RPG for the PC. The specially-developed game engine also breathes life into some stunning graphical features, including specular lighting highlights and dynamic shadow effects for enhanced realism and strategic stealth opportunities during gameplay. Handling vast and exquisitely detailed environments with ease, the engine eliminates load times during transit from one zone of the map to another. Explore the rich, open world of The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings in this PC edition like never before, scaling fences, cliffs, and walls, while navigating a naturalistic day and night cycle. Develop Geralt's skills in four key skill areas, each with multiple nodes and specialist levels. Gain experience points in the field and learn new skills in Training (combat and stamina), Swordsmanship, Magic and Alchemy (potions and bombs). Combining simple mouse clicks for a choice of Quick or Strong attacks with combo strings, the combat system is overhauled for The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings on the PC. Instead of balancing a system of strategic stances and timing as in previous games, this sequel takes a more action-based approach for high octane engagement. Slow down time with the radial menu to change weapons, items, and magic spells without breaking step at key battle moments. A suite of mini-games ranging from fist-fighting and arm-wrestling to poetry and gambling lend the game its excellent replay value. Browse online for downloadable content to expand the game even further with, for example, an Arena mode for a wave-based deathmatch challenge, and The Witcher 2: Dark Mode, a version of the game with an enhanced difficulty level and a range of additional dark-themed game items. The PC edition of Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings is available for Windows XP, Vista and 7 with other system and hardware requirements, including an Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 Ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ processor and a video card with 512MB RAM and support for Pixel Shader 3.0. A great among PC games and often ranked as the Game of the Year following its original release date in 2011, this expansive RPG promises an enduring and immersive gaming experience. It has a rating of M for blood and violence and an original cinematic soundtrack by Adam Skorupa and Krzysztof Wierzynkiewicz, which features some visceral battle sequences like 'The Wild Hunt.' So popular that it was later ported to the Xbox 360 platform and made available through the Xbox 360 Games Store, this PC gaming classic follows in the groundbreaking footsteps of its precursor. The epilogue, wherein Geralt learns about the mythical Wild Hunt, also sets the stage for the game's follow-up installment, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt.
